/.title: About me
/.content:
Hello! I'm Daniel. It's great to meet you. I'm an undergraduate studying Philosophy and Economics at the London School of Economics. You can read some of my writing on Substack at Systems. You can also access my CV here.

If you'd like to chat, please drop me an email at d.seymour@lse.ac.uk - I'd love to talk
